properties.Description: The properties that define a peer's ASN.

peerAsn.Description: The Autonomous System Number (ASN) of the peer.

peerContactDetail.Description: The contact details of the peer.

validationState.Description: The validation state of the ASN associated with the peer.

errorMessage.Description: The error message for the validation state

email.Description: The e-mail address of the contact.

phone.Description: The phone number of the contact.

properties.Description: The properties that define a registered ASN.

asn.Description: The customer's ASN from which traffic originates.

peeringServicePrefixKey.Description: The peering service prefix key that is to be shared with the customer.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the resource.

properties.Description: The properties that define a registered prefix.

prefix.Description: The customer's prefix from which traffic originates.

peeringServicePrefixKey.Description: The peering service prefix key that is to be shared with the customer.

errorMessage.Description: The error message associated with the validation state, if any.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the resource.

sku.Description: The SKU that defines the tier and kind of the peering.

properties.Description: The properties that define a peering.

name.Description: The name of the peering SKU.

tier.Description: The tier of the peering SKU.

family.Description: The family of the peering SKU.

size.Description: The size of the peering SKU.

direct.Description: The properties that define a direct peering.

exchange.Description: The properties that define an exchange peering.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the resource.

connections.Description: The set of connections that constitute a direct peering.

useForPeeringService.Description: The flag that indicates whether or not the peering is used for peering service.

peerAsn.Description: The reference of the peer ASN.

provisionedBandwidthInMbps.Description: The bandwidth that is actually provisioned.

sessionAddressProvider.Description: The field indicating if Microsoft provides session ip addresses.

useForPeeringService.Description: The flag that indicates whether or not the connection is used for peering service.

microsoftTrackingId.Description: The ID used within Microsoft's peering provisioning system to track the connection

peeringDBFacilityId.Description: The PeeringDB.com ID of the facility at which the connection has to be set up.

bgpSession.Description: The BGP session associated with the connection.

connectionIdentifier.Description: The unique identifier (GUID) for the connection.

errorMessage.Description: The error message related to the connection state, if any.

sessionPrefixV4.Description: The IPv4 prefix that contains both ends' IPv4 addresses.

sessionPrefixV6.Description: The IPv6 prefix that contains both ends' IPv6 addresses.

microsoftSessionIPv4Address.Description: The IPv4 session address on Microsoft's end.

microsoftSessionIPv6Address.Description: The IPv6 session address on Microsoft's end.

peerSessionIPv4Address.Description: The IPv4 session address on peer's end.

peerSessionIPv6Address.Description: The IPv6 session address on peer's end.

sessionStateV4.Description: The state of the IPv4 session.

sessionStateV6.Description: The state of the IPv6 session.

maxPrefixesAdvertisedV4.Description: The maximum number of prefixes advertised over the IPv4 session.

maxPrefixesAdvertisedV6.Description: The maximum number of prefixes advertised over the IPv6 session.

md5AuthenticationKey.Description: The MD5 authentication key of the session.

id.Description: The identifier of the referenced resource.

connections.Description: The set of connections that constitute an exchange peering.

peerAsn.Description: The reference of the peer ASN.

peeringDBFacilityId.Description: The PeeringDB.com ID of the facility at which the connection has to be set up.

bgpSession.Description: The BGP session associated with the connection.

connectionIdentifier.Description: The unique identifier (GUID) for the connection.

errorMessage.Description: The error message related to the connection state, if any.

properties.Description: The properties that define a Connection Monitor Test.

sourceAgent.Description: The Connection Monitor test source agent

destinationPort.Description: The Connection Monitor test destination port

testFrequencyInSec.Description: The Connection Monitor test frequency in seconds

isTestSuccessful.Description: The flag that indicates if the Connection Monitor test is successful or not.

path.Description: The path representing the Connection Monitor test.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the resource.

properties.Description: Gets or sets the peering prefix properties.

prefix.Description: The prefix from which your traffic originates.

errorMessage.Description: The error message for validation state

events.Description: The list of events for peering service prefix

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the resource.

eventTimestamp.Description: The timestamp of the event associated with a prefix.

eventType.Description: The type of the event associated with a prefix.

eventSummary.Description: The summary of the event associated with a prefix.

eventLevel.Description: The level of the event associated with a prefix.

eventDescription.Description: The description of the event associated with a prefix.

sku.Description: The SKU that defines the type of the peering service.

properties.Description: The properties that define a peering service.

name.Description: The name of the peering service SKU.

peeringServiceProvider.Description: The name of the service provider.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the resource.

providerPrimaryPeeringLocation.Description: The primary peering (Microsoft/service provider) location to be used for customer traffic.

providerBackupPeeringLocation.Description: The backup peering (Microsoft/service provider) location to be used for customer traffic.
